thread.title: Premier League Manager of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?
thread.title_full: Premier League Manager of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?

title: Premier League Manager of the Month: Who was the most recent winner at your club?
text:
1 of 38 Who was the most recent Manager of the Month winner at your club? 
While Manchester United are top of the pile when it comes to picking up Player of the Month awards , you have to go a fair way back to find their last Premier League Manager of the Month. 
Three current top-flight teams have never had a boss win the monthly accolade, while several sides struggling down the Football League will have a long wait before their next victorious manager. 
Scroll through the gallery above to find out who was the most recent boss at your club to win the Premier League Manager of the Month award. Related articles
